name: The Arena 2
description:
The Arena 2 is a platforming/fighting game where you fight through five stages to become champion of the arena. Control Iron Mike as he battles through enemies such as the monstrous Greti to the mob battling Lesser Fighters!

Before playing, customize your run by choosing between three difficulty settings with different modifiers from limited healing to no powerups in between levels. Between levels, you can pick 2 out of 5 moves to bring with you into the next stage, certain moves are better for certain stages, so test and plan accordingly.

Shoot for the highest score possible by keeping yourself healthy and playing on the hardest difficulty!

Made for IAT 410 Fall 2020 by Team Omega 4:

Project Manager: Reuben Newton
Lead Programmer: Rafael Pena
Level Designer: Hamid Ahmadzai
Lead Artist: Qianzhen Goh
UI Designer: Jasmine Wang
